thread.title: RT - Daily news: #IAmAMuslimToo protest takes over Times Square to denounce Trump’s travel ban (VIDEOS, PHOTOS)
thread.title_full: RT - Daily news: #IAmAMuslimToo protest takes over Times Square to denounce Trump’s travel ban (VIDEOS, PHOTOS)

author: RT
title: RT - Daily news: #IAmAMuslimToo protest takes over Times Square to denounce Trump’s travel ban (VIDEOS, PHOTOS)
text:
— Shella Cherry (@shellacherry) February 19, 2017 
The hip-hop mogul previously viewed Trump as a long-time friend in a 2011 blog post and the same year arranged a meeting with the billionaire and a select group of interfaith leaders to discuss religious bigotry in the United States. — Dawah Addict (@dawahaddict) February 19, 2017 Look at the beautiful diversity of the #iammuslimtoo rally in NYC. This is the best of America pic.twitter.com/zQAIXyEtX7 — (((DeanObeidallah))) (@Deanofcomedy) February 19, 2017 
“Everyone except white privileged males are in immediate danger,” Simmons said in a statement earlier this week. “African-Americans, women, Latinos, Asians and LGBTQ are all at risk, but there is no freedom in that privileged status either because the spirit of the oppressor is oppressed as well. We are living in a time when unity will make America great.” 
Schneier, the founder and president of the Foundation for Ethnic Understanding , told AMNY "this rally today is for America. Do you know why? Because any harm that happens to the Muslim community, which is an integral part of this nation, is harm [upon] all Americans." — sarah amy harvard (@amyharvard_) February 19, 2017 #iamamuslimtoo And I am one proud wife. pic.twitter.com/jJKFo34FKc
